title: Server issue
body: Hello, I currently live in Bangkok and play oceania server, but for some reason the ping is 430 ms. Which server is best recommended if I live in bangkok and want the best ping?

replies.body:
Hey there,

As Yaia pointed out below your best bet for most asian countries would be garena.
I'm no expert in this, but try either the Garena server (best bet) or NA (create a test account first, to save money transferring your main).
